In this session, we will be discussing from the twelfth verse of the twelfth chapter of the first canto of Srimad Bhagavatam.
Tata Sarva Gunodarke Sanukula Grahodaye Jagne Vamsadharapandur Bhuyapandur Ivaujasa
The meaning of this verse is,
Thereupon, when all the good signs of the zodiac gradually evolved,
the heir apparent of Pandu, who would be exactly like him in prowess, took birth.
So this is the chapter describing the birth of Emperor Pariksit.
And his birth is very special because by birth he is a pure devotee.
And that's the reason he was protected in the womb.
He was protected in the womb by the love of his mother, by Krishna himself personally.
And throughout his life, he was conducting himself as a pure devotee.
So such pure devotees are directly coming from the spiritual world.
They have got the purpose of life as the mission of the divine.
They have got the purpose of life as the mission of the divine.
They have got the purpose of life as the mission of the divine.
They have got the purpose of life as the mission of the divine.
And therefore, such personalities are described in Srimad Bhagavatam as ideal devotees whose footsteps we should all follow.

Now Pariksit's birth is happening in a very very favorable astronomical situation. The birth itself is like that and Srila Prabhupada will explain the reason for the birth being very special.
Srila Prabhupada says in the purport, astronomical calculations of stellar influences upon a living being are not suppositions, but are factual as confirmed in Srimad Bhagavatam.
There is a lot of speculation about what is astronomy.
What is astrology and what are the stars or the different heavenly bodies whose movements are basis of a calculation done in astronomy as well as in astrology.
A chart is prepared and based on the chart a learned astrologer can read.
And actually tell many things about the person taking birth in a particular time, in a particular place under the influence of these stars or these heavenly bodies appearing in the sky.
So, these calculations as Srila Prabhupada says here are factual.
They are not some theories based on some speculation which are some sentimental people's belief systems.
No, these are cent percent true and they are all factual.
And it is based on a complete science.
Jyotir Veda, complete science, perfect science.
So, Srila Prabhupada says further, every living being is controlled by the laws of nature at every minute.
It is foolish to think that we are free, independent.
We can do whatever we like.
No, we cannot.
There is some degree of freedom.
But we have to act responsibly because there is control by the laws of nature every minute.
Just as a citizen is controlled by the influence of the state.
Just like state laws are working.
And if somebody is belonging to a particular state, he has to obey the laws.
The state laws are grossly observed.
But the laws of material nature being subtle to our gross understanding cannot be experienced grossly.
How these influences are working.
The astronomical influences.
We cannot see with our eyes manifest in gross terms.
As stated in the Bhagavad Gita, third chapter, ninth verse.
Every action of life produces another reaction which is binding upon us.
Every action that we perform.
Every action has got a reaction according to the laws of nature.
And that reaction is binding us to this material world.
It is tying us down.
We cannot escape the reaction.
And it is also told in the same verse in the Bhagavad Gita.
Only those who are acting on behalf of Yajna or Vishnu
are not bound by reactions.
So there is a special facility given to human beings
who are performing actions on behalf of Vishnu.
Yajna.
Yajna arthat karma naha it is called.
Karma done. Actions done.
On behalf of Yajna. Yajna arthat.
Such people.
Who are they? They are devotees.
Devotees of Vishnu. Devotees of the Supreme Lord.
They are not bound by reactions.
Because they do all work on behalf of Vishnu.
So our Srila Prabhupada further says,
Our actions are judged by the higher authorities
who are the agents of the Lord.
And thus we are awarded bodies according to our activities.
So many living beings in so many varieties of bodies.
What is the basis somebody is born in a particular type of body?
The basis is the judgment of the higher authorities
according to the work we have performed in the previous life.
So there is a definite law working.
There is a definite basis.
There are enforcers of all these laws.
And they are not visible to our eyes.
They cannot be perceived with our gross senses.
Only foolish, ignorant, arrogant,
less intelligent, atheistic, demoniac people
say there is no higher control.
I don't believe in astronomy.
I don't believe in astrology.
I don't believe in scriptures.
Only such foolish people talk nonsense, rubbish.
And even as they are talking,
they don't realize
that even their movement of the tongue is controlled.
Next moment such a foolish person gets a paralytic stroke.
He can't talk. He can't move his limbs.
He cannot even utilize his body at all.
And he is simply admitted to some hospital
or he lies in some place
completely like a vegetable.
And then he speaks all kinds of rubbish
as long as he is able to vibrate his tongue.
You see, this is the reality.
And we see it all around us all the time.
All the time.
So, the fact is,
the laws of nature are there.
They are being enforced
by the devatas,
the agents of the Supreme Lord Krishna,
and they are binding upon us.
Nobody is exception.
Nobody is exception.
The laws of nature are so subtle
that every part of our body
is influenced by the respective stars.
And a living being obtains his working body
to fulfill his terms of imprisonment.
We are very proud of the body that we have,
but we don't realize
that this body is
a prison

for me.

That I do not know.
I am totally ignorant
of that reality.
So, therefore,
the scriptures are
enlightening us,
educating us,
informing us,
warning us

Why? Why are you imprisoned?
To fulfill

imposed by

according to

perfectly working.

bird-time constellation of stars.
